text: aho visvasa kalavuni! numbala seyitange piyavara val anugamanaya nokaranu. tavada kavareku seyitange piyavara anugamanaya karanne da evita ohu asilacara dæ ha pilikul sahagata dæ niyoga karanneya. tavada numbala veta allahge anugrahaya saha ohuge karunava novi nam numbala aturin kisivaku ho pivituru novanu æta. namut allah ohu abhimata karana aya pivituru karayi. tavada allah sarva sravaka sarva gnaniya
